text: U (Yezdan) ji wan kocer u arikaren (misilmane) ku di cara yekem da (misilman bune) u ewane ku bi qenci bune peyrewe van, qayil buye u ewan ji (bi wan tisten ku Yezdan daye wan) qayil bune u ewi ji bona wan ra ewan bihisten ku dibine (dare wan da) cem dikisin amade kiriye, ewanan di bihiste da hey diminin. Serfiraziya mezin eva ye
